author: Chris Lee
description: Quantum computing benchmark looks at fundamental limit of computer, not speed.
title: Bigger is better: Quantum volume expresses computer’s limit

author: TNW Deals
description:
No two computer systems are created equal. There are so many ways to go about assembling a functioning computer network that the possibilities are nearly infinite.

But knowing the ...
title: Learn what it takes to build a professional computer system for just $41

description: Officials have identified nearly 10 systems which are being operated for the administrative purpose were attacked. However computers used in ticket sales and other services to devotees remain unaffected.
title: Tirupati temple's computers hacked by ransomware - Times of India

author: Alle Beiträge von dpa  anzeigen.
description: Der Hackerangriff „Wanna Cry“ hat weltweit Störungen und Schäden verursacht. So auch bei der Deutschen Bahn, bei der rund 450 Computer betroffen waren. Das geforderte Lösegeld hat der Staatskonzern nicht gezahlt.
title: „Wanna Cry“: Cyberangriff legt 450 Bahn-Computer lahm

author: Rachel Becker
description: The world’s oldest known computer lay submerged for more than 2,000 years off the treacherous coast of the Greek island of Antikythera. Beneath the weight of the water, the sand, and the wrecked...
title: A 2,000-year-old computer called the Antikythera Mechanism helped the ancient Greeks understand their universe

author: Mark Walton
description: 13 teraflops FP32 performance and 16GB of HBM2 for compute markets with money to burn.
title: Radeon Vega Frontier Edition: First AMD Vega GPU is for the pros

author: Dan Goodin
description: Campaign that flew under the radar used hacked computers to mine Monero currency.
title: Massive cryptocurrency botnet used leaked NSA exploits weeks before WCry

description: A curious chilly area of space may have been created when a parallel universe crashed into our own, scientists have suggested, the first evidence that we may be part of a multiverse.
title: First evidence of the multiverse? Scientists think Cold Spot in space could be colliding universes

author: Joseph Menn
description: A computer virus that exploits the same vulnerability as the global "ransomware" attack has latched on to more than 200,000 computers and begun manufacturing digital currency, experts said Tuesday.
title: Hackers mint crypto-currency with technique in global 'ransomware' attack

description: Maru is a new kind of computing experience. It gives you a single, context-aware device that makes personal computing really simple. And guess what? That device is your smartphone.
title: Maru OS – Your phone is your PC
